title: This unit is stylish, posh, and spacious in need of a new tenant
map_address: 19833 West Villa Court near West Villa Court
posting_body: This unit is stylish, posh, and spacious in need of a new tenant!
Housed in the award winning community of ?
you will enjoy the subtle comforts of this established neighborhood whether hosting in the beautifully renovated clubhouse equipped with a pool or in your home.
This feature boasts an inviting cobblestone nook upon entry to the completely upgraded kitchen filled with chef finesse and class.
Granite countertops await your menu with stainless steel appliances, ceramic flooring, beautiful cabinetry, and recess lighting for the perfect shine.
The living room has high slopped ceilings with a beautiful hand painted chandelier.
The lower level is very spacious with a fire place where you can entertain or chill.
Close to MAJOR freeways, grocery stores, mall etc.
